languages.text: "Правильно делаешь, что не сопротивляешься, людишко. Сохранишь больше сил для битвы".
"How smart of you not to resist, humanling. Save your strength for the battle."
languages.original_text: "Правильно делаешь, что не сопротивляешься, людишко. Сохранишь больше сил для битвы".

traits.locale_text: "That's right, humanling. Do not resist, save strength for the battle."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "That's right, humanling. Do not resist, save strength for the battle."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "That's right, humanling. Do not resist, save strength for the battle."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "That's right, humanling. Do not resist, save strength for the battle."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "How smart of you not to resist, humanling. Save your strength for the battle."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "How smart of you not to resist, humanling. Save your strength for the battle."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「抵抗しないのは賢明だ、人の子よ。お前の力は戦いに温存しておくがいい」
languages.original_text: "How smart of you not to resist, humanling. Save your strength for the battle."

traits.locale_text: 「抵抗しないのは賢明だ、人の子よ。お前の力は戦いに温存しておくがいい」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “你可真聪明，小人儿，一点都没反抗。还是把力气省下来打仗吧。”
languages.original_text: "How smart of you not to resist, humanling. Save your strength for the battle."

traits.locale_text: “这就对了，小人儿。不要费劲抵抗，留着力气打仗吧。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Demuestras inteligencia al no resistirte, human{mf|o|a}. Guarda tus fuerzas para la batalla».
languages.original_text: "How smart of you not to resist, humanling. Save your strength for the battle."

traits.locale_text: «Así es, human{mf|o|a}. No te resistas; guarda fuerzas para la batalla».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Wie klug von Euch, keinen Widerstand zu leisten, Menschling. Spart Euch Eure Kraft für den Kampf auf."
languages.original_text: "How smart of you not to resist, humanling. Save your strength for the battle."

traits.locale_text: "So ist recht, Menschling. Wehrt Euch nicht, hebt Euch die Kraft für den Kampf auf."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Vous faites bien de ne pas résister, {mf|humain|humaine}. Gardez vos forces pour le combat. »
languages.original_text: "How smart of you not to resist, humanling. Save your strength for the battle."

traits.locale_text: « Vous faites bien de ne pas résister, {mf|humain|humaine}. Gardez vos forces pour le combat. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Direnmeyerek çok zekice davrandın insancık. Gücünü dövüşe sakla."
languages.original_text: "How smart of you not to resist, humanling. Save your strength for the battle."

traits.locale_text: "Direnmeyerek ne kadar zekice davrandın insancık. Gücünü dövüşe sakla."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
